Very gaming. i unlocked the gaming gun in the beginning and i flew at a fast pace. when i saw Wheatly i shot him and he died and i was stuck becasue he was not there to help. then i killed GlAdOs with the Gaming gun and she blew up and made a hole in the floor. after that i was stuck in the room in a run animation so i shot out the wall and i had to craft a pickaxe to make slime to slide up the hole and final made it out tho it did take about 76 9mm bullets to get through tho game and glados is now a sight for my gaming gun.

ğŸ™‚My ğ™‹ğ™šğ™§ğ™¨ğ™¤ğ™£ğ™–ğ™¡ OpinionğŸ™ƒ

This is the BEST valve game so far (please make portal 3 xd) an awesomely crafted story with deep lore reveals for the portal universe as well as some hints or Easter eggs from other games such as TF2 and half-life.
The game mechanics are super fun, new and well thought as always with tests that force you to think with portals  (if anyone tells you that videogames make people dumb, make them play this game and then make fun of them when they don't understand what momentum through portals is)  plus this game's narrative is freaking HILARIOUS with the meme core Wheatley and all the secret dialogues. Just gold
